title: Add hoodies, shorts, sunglasses, caps, and additional items to product catalog

requirements.summary: Update frontend ProductGrid component to add image URL mappings for all newly added products (hoodies, shorts, sunglasses, caps, and additional items)
acceptanceCriteria: All new product names are mapped to image URLs in the imageMap object
Placeholder image URLs follow the existing pattern (e.g., https://images.unsplash.com/...)
Images are appropriate for each product category
All new products display correctly in the product grid with their images

file_operations.description: Add imageMap entries for all newly added products: at least 2 hoodies, 2 shorts, 2 sunglasses, 2 caps, and 3 additional diverse products (jackets, sweaters, scarves, bags). Use appropriate Unsplash placeholder URLs for each product category that match the HIZE premium minimalist aesthetic. Ensure product names match exactly what was added in the backend, and maintain the existing imageMap pattern and structure.
